main event: An unidentified flying object was observed over Pennsylvania on November 7, 1957, described as a strange metallic object hovering at a high altitude.
interesting points: The object was approximately 50-100 feet in diameter, The pilot observed the object for several minutes before it accelerated and disappeared, The report includes the pilot's sketch of the object showing it as a circular, metallic-looking craft, The investigation was part of the U.S. Air Force's Project Blue Book, but no conclusion was reached about the object's nature, The sighting was recorded as possibly related to the Aurora Borealis phenomenon.
